analysis.description:
RSPLT_I.withdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! addr.call.gas(withdrawGas).value(amount)() (/unique_chucks/16/0x61f9d1ce56ac1623fed4e949d7d420251fef0896.sol#326-329)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/16/0x61f9d1ce56ac1623fed4e949d7d420251fef0896.sol#329:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/16/0x61f9d1ce56ac1623fed4e949d7d420251fef0896.sol:
	- Usage of "suicide()" should be replaced with "selfdestruct()"
